name: Pork Farker's Ritual Sacrifice
description:
Just another day at the office for the Pork. Collect sacrifices and bring them to the altar.

Controls:

A,S,W,D (or Arrows) - to move

Return (or Z) - to grab sacrifices, to set sacrifices on the altar

NOTE: There is no score nor win conditions for this version of the game. We ran out of time, but may update the project later. ;)

Pork Farker's Ritual Sacrifice was made for #GGJ16 by Chris and Hollie Figueroa. Follow us on Twitter: @kinifi @holliebuckets
